title: Manhattan Project National Historical Park: Guided Tours
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Guided Tours              Tour Information       Depending on the location, tours are available. Please see below for more information about touring the three locations that comprise Manhattan Project NHP.         Oak Ridge   OAK RIDGE   Address 300 S. Tulane Avenue Oak Ridge, TN 37830   Phone (865) 576-6767    Hours  Monday through Saturday 9:00-5:00 pm  Sunday 1:00-5:00 pm   More information about visiting Manhattan Project NHP in Oak Ridge, Tennessee.        Los Alamos   LOS ALAMOS  Address 475 20th Street Los Alamos, NM 87544    Phone (505) 661-6277    Hours    Winter Hours (Oct. 16 to April 30): 10:00–4:00 on weekdays 11:00–4:00 on weekends  Summer Hours (May 1 to Oct. 15): 9:30–4:30 on weekdays 11:00–4:00 on weekends   More information about visiting Manhattan Project NHP in Los Alamos, New Mexico.        Hanford   HANFORD Address 2000 Logston Blvd Richland, WA 99354   Phone (509) 376-1647    Hours    Summer Hours (April through November) 7:00-4:00 Monday through Saturday Closed Sunday Winter Hours (December through March) 8:00-4:00 Monday through Thursday Closed Friday through Sunday   More information about visiting Manhattan Project NHP in Hanford, Washington.
